VGServer::ByteOutBuffer

VGServer::ByteOutBuffer Class Reference

ByteOutBuffer is a cursor class to ByteBuffer implementing growing byte oriented memory buffer interface used in the graph server when constructing the client output. More...

#include <ByteOutBuffer.h>

ByteBuffer & buff
 reference to manipulated ByteBuffer

Detailed Description

ByteOutBuffer is a cursor class to ByteBuffer implementing growing byte oriented memory buffer interface used in the graph server when constructing the client output.
